content.text: Match ends, Sporting Braga 2, Istanbul Basaksehir 1.

Alexandru Epureanu (Istanbul Basaksehir) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Goal!  Sporting Braga 2, Istanbul Basaksehir 1. Fransergio (Sporting Braga) header from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Raúl Silva with a cross.
Attempt blocked. Fransergio (Sporting Braga) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
